set.name: DMSD-04 Jokers Bullets Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 4 or more Jokers in the battle zone, this creature costs 5 less to summon. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, one of your creatures gets +7000 power until the end of the turn. ■ Your Jokers can attack your opponent on the turn you put them into the battle zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have a Jokers that costs 5 or more in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ Whenever you are attacked by a creature, you may tap this creature to stop the attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Jokers creature that costs 6 or less, put it into the battle zone. If it's not, put it into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, if you have a total of 3 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it on the bottom of their deck. Then draw a card.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-04 Jokers Bullets Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Draw a card. {SUPER}: Destroy all creatures that cost the same as or less than the total number of your Jokers in the battle zone and/or your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-04 Jokers Bullets Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Jokers creature from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-04 Jokers Bullets Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your Jokers creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-04 Jokers Bullets Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have a colorless creature you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all colorless cards from among them into your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
